original_text: Moses and Aaron went away from the people to the door of the Tent of Meeting. They threw themselves down with their faces towards the ground. The glory of the Lord appeared to them.
korean_text: 모세와 아론이 회중 앞을 떠나 회막 문에 이르러 엎드리매 여호와의 영광이 그들에게 나타나며

sentences.original_text: Moses and Aaron went away from the people
to the door of the Tent of Meeting
They threw themselves down with their faces towards the ground
The glory of the Lord appeared to them
